text: Before “ Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt ” goes away for good, the streaming sitcom is bringing back some familiar, famous and fan - friendly faces. Netflix announced the guest star line up for the sitcom ’ s final run — its fourth season — on Thursday, which includes the returns of Jon Hamm, Amy Sedaris, Mike Carlsen, Zosia Mamet and Derek Klena. Busy Philipps, Greg Kinnear, Bobby Moynihan and Aidy Bryant will also join series regulars Ellie Kemper, Tituss Burgess, Jane Krakowski and Carol Kane.
